articles.title: Arc Raiders has an impressive 2025 roadmap, bringing a new map, community event, quests and more to the hit extraction shooter. - Eurogamer
articles.description: Arc Raiders has an impressive 2025 roadmap, bringing a new map, community event, quests and more to the hit extraction shooter.

articles.title: Logitech’s latest keyboard dabbles in enthusiast features - The Verge
articles.description: Hands-on with Logitech’s Alto Keys K98M mechanical keyboard, which brings enthusiast features, a pleasant typing sound, and some sharp looks to the masses.

articles.title: Google Wallet is finally fixing one of its most annoying flaws - Android Police
articles.description: No reason to envy Apple and Samsung now

articles.title: Amazon Liquidates RTX 5070 GPUs, Asus Model at New Record Low for Early Black Friday - Kotaku
articles.description: The Asus RTX 5070 delivers flagship 4K gaming at its lowest price ever.

articles.title: Google Translate adding model picker for ‘Advanced’ or ‘Fast’ translations - 9to5Google
articles.description: Following AI live translation and language practice capability, Google Translate is adding a model picker with “Fast” and “Advanced” options.

articles.title: Here's What The 'C' Actually Means On A USB-C Port - SlashGear
articles.description: Despite various theories and assumptions, the "C" in "USB-C" merely denotes that it's the third type of USB connector after Type-A and Type-B.
